blocks.name: ralbinrald
blocks.content: Elemination of a restricted universal quantification under certain conditions. (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 2-Aug-2017.)
blocks.origin:
thm ralbinrald(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2) {
  |- wi(w0, wb(wral(s0, c0, w1), w2))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c0))
  -| wi(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(s0), c1))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), c1), wb(w1, w2))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s0, w2)
} = {
  impbid(w0, wral(s0, c0, w1), w2)
  rspcdv(s0, c0, c1, w0, w1, w2)
  adantl(w0, wceq(cv(s0), c1), wb(w1, w2))
  ralrimdva(s0, c0, w0, w2, w1)
  biimpd(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), w2, w1)
  adantl(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0), wb(w2, w1))
  syl(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wb(w2, w1), wceq(cv(s0), c1))
  bicomd(wceq(cv(s0), c1), w2, w1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm ralbinrald(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2) {
  ⊢ (w0 →(∀(s0 ∈ c0, w1)↔ w2))
  ⊣ (w0 → c1 ∈ c0)
  ⊣ (s0 ∈ c0 → s0 = c1)
  ⊣ (s0 = c1 →(w1 ↔ w2))
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, w0)
  ⊣ d(s0, w2)
} = {
  impbid(w0, ∀(s0 ∈ c0, w1), w2)
  rspcdv(s0, c0, c1, w0, w1, w2)
  adantl(w0, s0 = c1, (w1 ↔ w2))
  ralrimdva(s0, c0, w0, w2, w1)
  biimpd((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0), w2, w1)
  adantl(w0, s0 ∈ c0, (w2 ↔ w1))
  syl(s0 ∈ c0, (w2 ↔ w1), s0 = c1)
  bicomd(s0 = c1, w2, w1)
}
